title: 820-3332 with short on PPVOUT_S0_LCDBKLT
message:
Maybe I'm having an off day, but this board is pissing me off..
820-3332 came in from another shop, had no backlight.

Found an 8ohm short on PPVOUT_S0_LCDBKLT
So, i start taking off all components related, started with caps C9715/16/17/18/19, then took off LVDS since short still there, C9000 as well: short is still there!

I took D9701 and R9708 off the board, and the short is still there  
  am i missing something because of being braindead today? Or do you guys think there is a short in the board?

title: 820-3332 with short on PPVOUT_S0_LCDBKLT
message: Just wanted to add that the short is there with no screen connected

title: 820-3332 with short on PPVOUT_S0_LCDBKLT
message:
ok, nevermind, found it: pad under C9719 exploded and shorted to a groundplane in the board.
Now for a very fun coating and reconnecting job...

title: 820-3332 with short on PPVOUT_S0_LCDBKLT
message:
haha lol yeah.. I finally have it fixed though.
Had to run this fucking jumper for the trackpad connector as well, Jesus.
